mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board (bno, bcd, uno, btitle, bctnt, bidx) VALUES ((SELECT NEXTVAL(iboard_seq)),#{bcd},#{uno},#{btitle},#{bctnt},(SELECT LASTVAL(iboard_seq)))
mapper.select: SELECT A.bno, A.uno, A.bcd, A.btitle, A.bctnt, A.bidx, A.bord , A.bdept, A.brdt , B.unm as writer FROM t_board as A LEFT JOIN t_user as B ON A.uno = B.uno where A.bdel = 0 AND A.bcd = #{bcd} ORDER BY A.bidx desc, A.bord asc
SELECT A.bno, A.uno, A.bcd, A.btitle,A.bctnt, A.bidx, A.bord , A.bdept, A.brdt , B.unm as writer FROM t_board as A LEFT JOIN t_user as B ON A.uno = B.uno WHERE A.bno = #{bno} AND bdel = 0
